title: ANOTHER Bachelorette contestant on Angie Kent's season of the show is revealed to be married
text:
Angie Kent was left shocked on Thursday's episode of The Bachelorette when Carlin Sterritt confessed he was still legally married.

And the Gogglebox star may be set to face the same drama all over again, with contestant Adam Sellars' past yet to be discussed on the show.

While freediving instructor Adam, 34, has been upfront about being a father, he is yet to mention his marriage.

When will he tell Angie Kent the truth? ANOTHER Bachelorette contestant's (PICTURED: Adam Sellars) life with wife and kids surfaces

PICTURED: According to Yahoo Lifestyle , the Queenslander reportedly married Sarah-Rose Sellars in 2009, and separated eight years later in 2017

According to Yahoo Lifestyle, the Queenslander reportedly married Sarah-Rose Sellars in 2009, and separated eight years later in 2017.

On Facebook, Sarah-Rose updated her status to 'married' in April 2009 with photos of herself and Adam dressed in white proceeding the announcement.

Meanwhile, mentions of marriage are absent from Adam's social media pages.

The former couple do however still have old photos of one another with their two young children on their profiles, with Sarah-Rose even calling Adam 'best dad our kids could ask for' in a post from 2013.

Married life: On Facebook, Sarah-Rose updated her status to 'married' in April 2009 with photos of herself and Adam dressed in white proceeding the announcement

Yahoo Lifestyle also claimed that Adam and Sarah-Rose may not have completely finalised their divorce yet - but are definitely no longer together.

An alleged source said that the marriage 'was mentally over for them ages ago'.

Daily Mail Australia has reached out to Channel 10 and Sarah-Rose Sellars for further comment.

Blindsided! Angie (pictured) was left speechless on Thursday night's episode of The Bachelorette when contestant Carlin Sterritt told her he was still legally married

It comes after Daily Mail Australia exclusively revealed the identity of Carlin Sterritt's estranged wife: stunning New Zealand real estate agent Taran Higgins.

Photos emerged of the former couple, who married in 2016 at the Sirromet Winery in Queensland, during happier times.

During Thursday night's episode, Carlin admitted that he was technically still married to his estranged wife.

Look out, Angie! The estranged wife of Bachelorette star Carlin (left) has been revealed as stunning New Zealand real estate clerk Taran Higgins (right). Pictured in 2016

After landing a 24-hour date with Angie, he confessed his divorce hadn't yet been officially finalised.

'I am the type of guy who wants to be open and transparent, because, you know, there's no other way to do it. I am... married,' he stammered.

His revelation prompted a shell-shocked Angie to laugh nervously in response.

'In 2016, I, um... I got married. We've been apart for a year-and-a-half,' he continued, claiming he and his wife simply 'drifted apart'.

'I was pretty hurt in the process, and she's moved overseas now. So, like, for me that was sort of like, you know, I was, like, I've closed that chapter of my life.'
description: Angie Kent was shocked Thursday's episode of The Bachelorette when Carlin Sterritt confessed he was still legally married.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
